metadata.title: CVE-2020-10232 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In version 4.8.0 and earlier of The Sleuth Kit (TSK), there is a stackbuffer overflow vulnerability in the YAFFS file timestamp parsing logic inyaffsfs_istat() in fs/yaffs.c.

criterions.comment: sleuthkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
